summary.overallFindings: RTX Corporation demonstrates strong responsible AI practices in transparency, explainability, human oversight, privacy, and governance, with multiple detailed and verifiable sources supporting these pillars. The company provides high-level references to fairness but lacks public documentation of specific bias mitigation methods. There is no public evidence of external audits or formal public commitments to responsible AI standards. Overall, RTX's responsible AI disclosures are robust in internal governance and operational transparency, but notable gaps remain in fairness implementation and external accountability.
